features.title: Idea to Reality
features.subtitle: FlowCode distills complex development into a seamless journey. No coding experience. No environment setup.
features.step1_desc: A screenshot, a sketch, or just a sentence. AI understands your intent — no technical jargon required. Your idea is the best input.
features.step2_desc: Watch code flow like ink across the screen. AI transforms your vision into real, runnable code — line by line, building your dream.
features.step3_desc: No server setup. No DevOps knowledge needed. Cloudflare's global edge network makes your creation accessible worldwide, instantly.
features.step4_desc: From a thought in your mind to a live website — in 10 minutes. This isn't magic. This is FlowCode.
